title: Healthcare Facility Maintenance: Ensuring Equipment Reliability 24/7
content:
Managing maintenance in our 500-bed hospital is becoming increasingly challenging. We need to maintain 99.99% uptime for critical equipment while balancing costs and regulatory compliance.

Key challenges:
1. Preventing equipment failures in critical care units
2. Managing maintenance schedules without disrupting patient care
3. Meeting Joint Commission requirements
4. Coordinating with multiple equipment vendors

Looking for insights from other healthcare facility managers on how you're handling these challenges, especially with AI and predictive maintenance solutions.
